document.full_text: fifa's world cup bidding process will remain open to abuse unless changes are made, australia's olympic chief has said in the wake of corruption allegations over voting for the 2018 and 2022 finals.
document.title: fifa voting system open to abuse: aoc chief
lines_and_colors: fifa's world cup bidding process will remain open to abuse unless changes are made, australia's olympic chief has said in the wake of corruption allegations over voting for the 2018 and 2022 finals.
